CheckCreateDBInstance.summary: Performs a precheck before an ApsaraDB for SelectDB instance is created.

schema.description: The database engine of the instance.
The version of the database engine.

The subscription duration of the instance. Valid values:

*   If Period is set to Year, valid values of UsedTime are 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5.
*   If Period is set to Month, valid values of UsedTime are 1 to 12.

>  This parameter takes effect and is required only if ChargeType is set to Prepaid.

The specifications of the instance. Valid values:

*   **selectdb.xlarge**: 4 CPU cores and 32 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.2xlarge**: 8 CPU cores and 64 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.4xlarge**: 16 CPU cores and 128 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.8xlarge**: 32 CPU cores and 256 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.16xlarge**: 64 CPU cores and 512 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.24xlarge**: 96 CPU cores and 768 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.32xlarge**: 128 CPU cores and 1,024 GB of memory.

CheckCreateDBInstance.title: CheckCreateDBInstance

CreateDBInstance.summary: Creates an ApsaraDB for SelectDB instance.

schema.title: 幂等参数
schema.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.
The database engine of the instance. Default value: **selectdb**.
The database engine version of the instance. Default value: **3.0**.

The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go
*   **Prepaid**: subscription

The subscription duration of the instance. Valid values:

*   If Period is set to Year, valid values of UsedTime are 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5.
*   If Period is set to Month, valid values of UsedTime are 1 to 12.

>  This parameter takes effect and is required only when **ChargeType** is set to **Prepaid**.

The unit of the subscription duration of the cluster. Valid values:

*   **Year**: subscription on a yearly basis.
*   **Month**: subscription on a monthly basis.

>  This parameter takes effect and is required only when **ChargeType** is set to **Prepaid**.
The instance type. You can call the [DescribeAllDBInstanceClass](~~2853363~~) operation to query instance types.

schema.example: The instance is created for testing.

schema.description: The IP addresses in the whitelist of the instance. Separate multiple IP addresses with commas (,).

items.description: The details of the instance tag.

schema.description: The deployment method of the instance.

The configurations of multi-zone deployment.

> 

*   This parameter takes effect and is required only when DeployScheme is set to multi_az.

Specifies whether to add the virtual private cloud (VPC) CIDR block to the IP address whitelist. Valid values:

*   1: yes.
*   0: no.

CreateDBInstance.title: CreateDBInstance

DescribeDBInstances.summary: Queries the information about ApsaraDB for SelectDB instances.

schema.description: The instance ID. Separate multiple instance IDs with commas (,).

The state of the instance. Valid values:

*   **CREATING**: The instance is being created.
*   **ACTIVATION**: The instance is running.
*   **RESOURCE_CHANGING**: The resource configuration of the instance is being changed.
*   **ORDER_PREPARING**: The order is being confirmed.
*   **READONLY_RESOURCE_CHANGING**: The resource configuration of the instance is being changed and the instance is write-locked.
*   **DELETING**: The instance is being deleted.

The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30** (default)
*   **50**
*   **100**
The region ID of the instance.

PageNumber.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30** (default)
*   **50**
*   **100**

TotalRecordCount.description: The total number of entries returned.

Items.description: The details about each instance returned.

connectionString.description: The connection string of the instance.

Engine.description: The database engine of the instance.

EngineVersion.description: The database engine version of the instance.

ChargeType.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go.
*   **Prepaid**: subscription.

Category.description: The edition of the instance. Default value: basic.

Status.description:
The state of the instance. Valid values:

*   **CREATING**: The instance is being created.
*   **ACTIVATION**: The instance is running.
*   **RESOURCE_CHANGING**: The resource configuration of the instance is being changed.
*   **ORDER_PREPARING**: The order is being confirmed.
*   **READONLY_RESOURCE_CHANGING**: The resource configuration of the instance is being changed and the instance is write-locked.
*   **DELETING**: The instance is being deleted.

ResourceCpu.description: The number of CPU cores of the instance.

ResourceMemory.description: The memory capacity of the instance.

ScaleMin.description: The minimum number of RDS capacity units (RCUs).

StorageType.description: The storage type of the instance.

ObjectStoreSize.description: The storage capacity of the instance. Unit: GB.

ExpireTime.description:
The time when the cluster expires.

>  A specific value is returned only for subscription clusters whose billing method is **Prepaid**. For pay-as-you-go clusters whose billing method is **Postpaid**, no value is returned.

LockMode.description: The lock mode of the instance.

LockReason.description: The reason why the instance is locked.

IsDeleted.description:
Indicates whether the instance is deleted. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

MaintainStarttime.description: The start time of the instance maintenance window.

MaintainEndtime.description: The end time of the instance maintenance window.

GmtCreated.description: The time when the task was created. The time is displayed in UTC.

GmtModified.description: The time when the task was last modified. The time is displayed in UTC.

ParentInstance.description: The time when the instance was created.

ResourceGroupId.description: The ID of the resource group.

MaintainStartTimeStr.description: The start timestamp of the maintenance window.

MaintainEndTimeStr.description: The end timestamp of the maintenance window.

TenantClusterId.description: The ID of the cluster that is monitored by Managed Service for Prometheus.

TenantToken.description: The token that is used to access Managed Service for Prometheus.

TenantUserId.description: The ID of the account that uses Managed Service for Prometheus.

Tags.description: The details about each tag returned.

DescribeDBInstances.title: DescribeDBInstances

DescribeDBInstanceAttribute.summary: Queries the details about an ApsaraDB for SelectDB instance.

schema.description: The region ID of the instance.

Status.description:
The state of the instance. Valid values:

*   **CREATING**: The instance is being created.
*   **ACTIVATION**: The instance is running.
*   **RESOURCE_CHANGING**: The resource configuration of the instance is being changed.
*   **ORDER_PREPARING**: The order is being confirmed.
*   **READONLY_RESOURCE_CHANGING**: The resource configuration of the instance is being changed and the instance is write-locked.
*   **DELETING**: The instance is being deleted.

GmtModified.description: The time when the instance was last modified, such as when you restarted the instance or applied for a public endpoint for the instance. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ format. The time must be in UTC.

LockMode.description: The lock mode of the instance. Set the value to **lock**, which specifies that the instance is locked when it automatically expires or has an overdue payment.

LockReason.description: The reason why the instance is locked.

ResourceCpu.description: The number of CPU cores of the instance.

ObjectStoreSize.description: The storage capacity of the instance.

MaintainStarttime.description: The start time of the instance maintenance window.

MaintainEndtime.description: The end time of the instance maintenance window.

DBClusterList.description: The information about each cluster returned.

Status.description:
The state of the cluster. Valid values:

*   **CREATING**: The cluster is being created.
*   **ACTIVATION**: The cluster is running.
*   **RESOURCE_CHANGING**: The resource configuration of the cluster is being changed.
*   **ORDER_PREPARING**: The order is being confirmed.
*   **READONLY_RESOURCE_CHANGING**: The resource configuration of the cluster is being changed and the cluster is write-locked.
*   **DELETING**: The cluster is being deleted.

CreatedTime.description: The time when the cluster was created.

DbClusterClass.description:
The specifications of the cluster. Valid values:

*   **selectdb.xlarge**: 4 CPU cores and 32 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.2xlarge**: 8 CPU cores and 64 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.4xlarge**: 16 CPU cores and 128 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.8xlarge**: 32 CPU cores and 256 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.16xlarge**: 64 CPU cores and 512 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.24xlarge**: 96 CPU cores and 768 GB of memory.
*   **selectdb.32xlarge**: 128 CPU cores and 1,024 GB of memory.

StartTime.description: The time when the cluster started.

ChargeType.description:
The billing method of the cluster. Valid values:

*   **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go.
*   **Prepaid**: subscription.

Engine.description: The database engine of the instance.

EngineVersion.description: The database engine version of the instance.

EngineMinorVersion.description: The minor kernel version number of the instance.

CreateTime.description: The time when the instance was created.

ChargeType.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go.
*   **Prepaid**: subscription.

ExpireTime.description: The time when the instance expires.

ResourceGroupId.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs.

Tags.description: The tags that are added to the instances. Each tag is a key-value pair that consists of two parts: TagKey and TagValue. Format: `{"key1":"value1"}`.

ResetAccountPassword.summary: Resets the password of an account for an ApsaraDB for SelectDB instance.

schema.description: The region ID of the instance.
The database account of the instance.

The password of the database account. Requirements:

*   The password must contain at least three of the following character types: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters.
*   The following special characters can be used: ! @ # $ % ^ & \* ( ) \_ + - =
*   The password must be 8 to 32 characters in length.

ModifySecurityIPList.summary: Modifies the IP addresses in a whitelist of an ApsaraDB for SelectDB instance.

schema.description: The region ID of the instance.
The name of the whitelist. Default value: **Default**.
The IP addresses in the whitelist of the instance. Separate multiple IP addresses with commas (,).

The mode in which you want to modify the whitelist. Valid values:

*   **0**: overwrites the IP addresses in the whitelist.
*   **1**: adds IP addresses to the whitelist.
*   **2**: removes IP addresses from the whitelist.

SecurityIPList.description: The IP addresses in the whitelist of the instance. Multiple IP addresses are separated by commas (,).

WhitelistNetType.description: The network type of the whitelist.
